nodes.name: Start
nodes.notes:
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
  NODE 1: START (MANUAL TRIGGER)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
  Workflow Entry Point - Top-level orchestrator
  for entire RoleFinder system

  What it does:
  - Starts the complete job monitoring pipeline
  when you click 'Execute workflow'
  - This is the top-level workflow that
  orchestrates all sub-workflows
  - Replaces the old pattern where Loop
  Companies was the entry point

  -  Profile loaded here (once) and passed down
  - Enables future multi-profile support (change
  profile_id filter)

  How to use:
  - In n8n UI, click the 'Execute workflow' button
  - Or schedule this workflow to run
  automatically (cron: 0 6 * * *)
  - Profile data flows automatically to all
  child workflows

nodes.name: Load Profile
nodes.notes:
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
  NODE 2: LOAD PROFILE DATA  ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê Loads candidate profile from database for AI
 evaluation

  Purpose:
  - Retrieves resume, experience, and target job criteria
  - Loaded ONCE at workflow start (not
  repeatedly in child workflows)
  - This profile data flows through entire
  pipeline automatically

  Database table: profile_data
  Expected schema:
  - profile_id: string (PRIMARY KEY) -
  "default", "profile_1", etc.
  - profile_name: string - [name]
  - resume_text: text - Complete
  resume/experience summary
  - target_criteria: text - Job search criteria
  and preferences

  Query filter:
  - profile_id = "default" ‚Üí Loads the
  default/primary profile
  - To use different profile: Change "default"
  to "profile_1", etc.
  - Future: Could make this dynamic based on
  user selection

  Data flow:
  1. This node loads profile ‚Üí passes to Loop
  Companies
  2. Loop Companies adds to each job as
  _context_profile_data
  3. Loop Jobs receives jobs with embedded profile
  4. AI evaluation uses profile to score job fit

  Output: Single item with complete profile data

nodes.name: Call 'Send Email v2.3'
nodes.notes:
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
  NODE 4: CALL SEND EMAIL SUB-WORKFLOW ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
  Executes the email generation and delivery workflow

  Purpose:
  - Aggregates all evaluated jobs from
  email_queue table
  - Generates professional HTML digest email
  - Delivers via Gmail API
  - Completes the daily job monitoring cycle

  Workflow called: Send Email v2.1
  Input: Summary data from Loop Companies
  - Receives workflow_run_id for querying email_queue
  - Profile data NOT needed (already embedded in
  job cards)

  What Send Email v2.1 does:
  1. Queries email_queue for all jobs from this
  workflow run
  2. Sorts jobs by overall_score (best matches first)
  3. Groups by recommendation category
  (excellent/good/consider)
  4. Generates dynamic email subject line
  5. Builds HTML email with all formatted job cards
  6. Sends via Gmail API
  7. Returns delivery confirmation

  Data sources:
  Send Email queries email_queue table:
  - WHERE workflow_run_id = {{
  $json.workflow_run_id }}
  - Gets ALL jobs evaluated during this run
  - Jobs already contain:
    - Complete job details
    - AI evaluation scores
    - Formatted HTML cards
    - Profile matching results

  Email structure:
  ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
  ‚îÇ üéØ Your Daily Job Digest          ‚îÇ
  ‚îÇ Monday, December 29, 2025          ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
  ‚îÇ Summary: 15 Excellent, 45 Strong   ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
  ‚îÇ [Job Card 1 - Score 10/10]         ‚îÇ
  ‚îÇ [Job Card 2 - Score 9/10]          ‚îÇ
  ‚îÇ ...                                ‚îÇ
  ‚îÇ [Job Card 120 - Score 3/10]        ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
  ‚îÇ Footer: Workflow Run ID #67890     ‚îÇ
  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò

  Execution time:
  - Query: ~1 second (120 rows)
  - Email generation: ~1 second
  - Gmail API: ~1 second
  - Total: ~3 seconds

  Delivery:
  - Recipient: [configured in Send Email workflow]
  - Method: Gmail API (OAuth2 authenticated)
  - Appears in: Gmail Inbox + Sent folder
  - Deliverability: >99% (verified sender,
  proper authentication)

  Error handling:
  - Gmail API failures logged in Send Email execution
  - Retry logic: 3 attempts with exponential backoff
  - If all attempts fail: Email saved to
  database for manual retry
  - User notified via separate error
  notification (if configured)

  Return value:
  Send Email returns:
  {
    status: "success",
    email_sent: true,
    recipient: "[email address]",
    jobs_included: 120,
    message_id: "<abc123@mail.gmail.com>",
    delivered_at: "2025-12-29T06:08:15Z"
  }

  Workflow completion:
  After this node executes:
  - Main workflow completes
  - User receives daily digest email
  - Database contains:
    - jobs table: Raw job data
    - email_queue table: Formatted job cards
    - errors table: Any failed companies
  - Ready for tomorrow's scheduled run

nodes.name: Call 'Loop Companies v4.1'
nodes.notes:
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
  NODE 3: CALL LOOP COMPANIES SUB-WORKFLOW  ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
  Executes the company discovery and job
  processing workflow

  Purpose:
  - Orchestrates company-by-company job discovery
  - Passes profile data from parent to child workflow
  - Handles all company iteration and error
  management
  - Returns control when all companies complete

  Workflow called: Loop Companies v3.1
  Input: Profile data from Load Profile node
  - n8n automatically passes data from previous node
  - Profile available as $json in child workflow

  What Loop Companies v3.1 does:
  1. Loads companies from companies table
  2. Iterates one company at a time (fault tolerance)
  3. For each company:
     - Calls Apify API to discover jobs
     - Enriches jobs with profile data
  (_context_profile_data)
     - Saves raw jobs to database (backup)
     - Calls Loop Jobs sub-workflow with enriched jobs
  4. Logs errors for failed companies
  5. Returns summary when all complete

  Execution time:
  - ~40 companies √ó ~10 seconds per company = ~7-8 minutes total
  - Includes: API calls, database saves,
  sub-workflow calls
  - May vary based on job counts and API
  response times

  Waiting behavior:
  - This node WAITS for Loop Companies to
  complete entirely
  - All companies processed before advancing
  - All jobs evaluated by AI before advancing
  - This ensures complete data set for email
  generation

  Error handling:
  - Loop Companies handles errors internally
  - Failed companies logged to errors table
  - Workflow continues even if some companies fail
  - Main workflow always completes (no crash)

  Return value:
  Loop Companies returns:
  {
    workflow_run_id: 67890,
    companies_processed: 40,
    jobs_found: 120,
    errors: 5,
    execution_time_ms: 456000
  }

  This return data flows to Send Email for reference.
